song.title: purple apricots
song.info:
Track 10 in the Hysterical Chipdisk. The most developed piece in the musicdisk, but still short, clocking in at just over a minute. Taking full advantage of some cheap and cheerful Casio drumsounds. Major scale intro & outro with the main parts of the song utilising a repetitive minor scale riff.
Released originally in March 1997.
Check traxinspace for the entire disk. http://www.traxinspace.com/profile/andyabstract
